sync_command_created.prompt:
After creating a Tauri command:

1. log_activity(
     type='code_change',
     title='Created Tauri command: {name}',
     entity_type='task',
     entity_id='{task_id}',
     metadata={
       agent: 'tauri',
       command: '{name}',
       artifacts: ['src-tauri/src/commands/{name}.rs']
     }
   )

complete_desktop_task.prompt:
When desktop task is complete:

1. update_task task_id='{id}' status='done'
2. log_activity(
     type='task_update',
     title='‚úÖ Desktop task completed: {title}',
     entity_type='task',
     entity_id='{task_id}',
     metadata={ agent: 'tauri' }
   )
3. notify_team(
     type='success',
     title='Desktop task completed',
     message='{title}',
     recipients=['pm']
   )
